name: Pension Steiner
description: The Pension Steiner is a family run bed and breakfast, with a total of 24 beds. Benefit from our central, yet quiet position. The Penken lift station, the high street, the forest, the adventure swimming pool, tennis courts and ice skating rink are all only 100m away. A comfortable guest lounge is available for use any time, and our sun terrace is also very popular. The rooms are equipped with shower/WC, telephone and television. Our many regular guests are proof of a pleasant stay.

Included in price: Local taxes and breakfast buffet.
In summer: Table tennis.

Check in 12.00hr / Check out 10.00hr.
This is the easiest way to reach us by car: At the beginning of Mayrhofen drive striaght ahead at the roundabout, going past the railway station. Approx. 50m after the railway station turn left in to "Mayrhofen Mitte".  After 150m you will drive past the post office and reach the high street.  Turn right in to the high street (one way). After approx 400m take the second turning on the left (after Hotel Strass, and directly opposite the Penken lift station). Drive approx. 150m up to the next left turn.  Our house is the second in this road.

makesOffer.name: Single room, shower, toilet
makesOffer.description: Single room with shower/WC, cable TV, telephone and safe in room.

makesOffer.name: Double room, shower, toilet
makesOffer.description: Double room with shower/WC, cable TV, telephone and safe in room. Extra bed (sofa bed).
